description.narrative: The Development Accelerator is a one-off facility to support governments and companies in developing bankable business cases. Promising projects often do not go beyond the early stages of project development due to a lack of parties willing to take the lead, high risks and insufficient funding for the necessary activities in the initial phase. The Development Accelerator focuses specifically on the initiation phase through mitigation of the problems mentioned above.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
